name: DRPG
description:
Kinda a mix between a RPG and a Fighting Game.

Made together with PhoenixCraft for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

This is our first Game Jam that we participated in and we are quite happy with what we achieved.

We might make a polished version of this, but that would be quite alot of work, so no promises for now.

//Also, yes, we know, the character-design is very creative indeed
